original_text: take these men and purify yourself along with them and pay their expenses, so that they may shave their heads. Thus all will know that there is nothing in what they have been told about you, but that you yourself also live in observance of the law.
korean_text: 그들을 데리고 함께 결례를 행하고 그들을 위하여 비용을 내어 머리를 깎게 하라 그러면 모든 사람이 그대에 대하여 들은 것이 사실이 아니고 그대도 율법을 지켜 행하는 줄로 알 것이라

sentences.original_text: and purify yourself along with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 함께 네 자신을 정결케 하라

sentences.original_text: so that they may shave their heads
that there is nothing in what they have been told about you
sentences.korean_translation: 네게 대한 그들의 소문이 아무것도 없다는 것과

sentences.original_text: but that you yourself also live in observance of the law
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 스스로도 율법을 지키며 산다는 것을
